alert.note: Alert for Greene; Morgan; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:41PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Morgan, north central Putnam and south central Greene Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 341 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Harmony, or 7 miles southeast of Madison, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Buckhead, Phoenix, Rock Eagle 4-H Center, Parks Mill, Swords and Harmony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
